en-us.activitiesEnjoyDoingTogether: Which kinds of activities do you enjoy doing together with your child?
en-us.anythingElseToKnow: Is there anything else that you would like us to know about your child?
en-us.babySitters: Has the child had experience with baby-sitters or caregivers other than parents?
en-us.benefitsInThisCareCenter: What do you see as the benefits your child will receive from participating in this child care center?
en-us.changesMade: Changes have been made, please save if you want to keep them
en-us.describeYourChild: How would you describe your child?
en-us.enterMonthsYears: Enter months and years ("0" if applicable)
en-us.groupPlayExperience: Has the child had group play experience?
en-us.handleFrustration: How does your child handle frustration?
en-us.hasEnrolledSiblings: Does the child have or previously had siblings enrolled in this center?
en-us.healthConditions: Has your child had or currently have the following health conditions?
en-us.holidaysCelebrate: Which holidays do you celebrate at home?
en-us.ifNotPhysician: if Physician cannot be reached what action should be taken?
en-us.illnessFrequent: Has your child had any of the following?
en-us.illnessPast: What past illnesses has he / she had and at what age?
en-us.indoorPlayActivities: What are your child’s favorite indoor play activities?
en-us.isAllergicMedication: Is child allergic to any medication?
en-us.knowIsAdopted: Does child know that he/she is adopted?
en-us.languageAdoption: If so, what language do you use with your child regarding adoption?
en-us.methodOfBehaviorControlAtHome: What method of behavior control is used in your home?
en-us.monthYearApplicationStartDate: What month / year are you applying for as start date?
en-us.name: name
en-us.neighborhoodPlaymates: Does the child have any neighborhood playmates? Specify
en-us.oneRegisterMinimum: one register is the minimum for this section
en-us.otherPeopleTakeChild: Additional people (besides parents) who may be called in an emergency to take the child from the facility
en-us.personsTakeChild: Name of persons authorized to take child from the facility
en-us.physicianInEmergency: Physician to be called in Emergency
en-us.playWithWater: Does your child play with water?
en-us.pleaseIncludeDoctorLetter: Please include a letter from your doctor confirming the above information including Reaction and Treatment
en-us.qualityChildPersonalityMostPleasingToYou: What quality of your child’s personality is most pleasing to you?
en-us.rightOrLeftHanded: Is child right or left handed?
en-us.roomAlone: Does child have a room alone?
en-us.selfComfortingSkills: Does your child have self comforting skills or does he/she rely on a pacifier or bottle?
en-us.sleepInTheSameBedWithYou: Does child sleep in the same bed with you?
en-us.specialFearsYouAreAwareOf: Does your child have any special fears that you are aware of?
en-us.speechProblemsWeShouldAwareOf: Does your child have any speech problems that we should be aware of?
en-us.statementsHealthOverall: statement or evaluation of your child’s overall heath
en-us.timeEatBreakfast: What time does child usually eat breakfast?
en-us.timeEatDinner: What time does child usually eat dinner?
en-us.timeEatLunch: What time does child usually eat lunch?
en-us.usualReaction: What is your child’s usual reaction?
en-us.watchTV: When and with whom does child watch TV?
en-us.wordBowelMovement: Word child uses for bowel movement
